name: Jigsaw Puzzles Now
description:
Fall into pleasant daydreams with new amazing jigsaw puzzles! Hours of entertainment on your iPhone and iPad!

Jigsaw Puzzles Now is unlike any you’ve ever seen! Entertaining and brain training puzzles will touch everyone's heart and hold attention right to the last piece! Extraordinary game for a truly fun and challenging experience.

REGULAR UPDATES
• Enjoy new FREE colorful jigsaw puzzles EVERY DAY!
• Recommendations - HAND PICKED content based on what you like!

AMAZING CONTENT
• Tons of content - incredible collections and packs of high quality puzzle images will strike your imagination
• Dozens of unique categories with puzzle pictures you’ll love

CHALLENGES AND DIFFICULTY
• Choose your challenge - from 20 to 400 unique pieces
• 3 different puzzle shapes
• Rotation mode for advanced players

EXCELLENT GAMEPLAY
• Preview the finished puzzle picture to help you solve it
• Attractive design - every piece has unique shape - no two pieces are alike
• Move pieces in groups
• Save incomplete puzzle and finish them later
• Play multiple puzzles at a time and track their progress

AND MUCH MORE
• Fun for all ages and skill levels
• No more mess and missing pieces
• No need internet for your entertainment
• Friendly interface that is simple and easy to use
• Share completed puzzles with friends or save them in your photo album

Enjoy your time by collecting amazing jigsaw puzzles! This entrancing game is perfect for the young & young at heart! Improve your memory skills and feel fun at the same time!

Finish these beautiful, inspirational puzzles is just the beginning of a wonderful adventure! Download now!
